events.title: the William Brown hits an iceberg and sinks

movie.title: Abandon Ship
movie.plot: Ship's officer finds himself in command of a lifeboat full of survivors of a sunken luxury liner.

movie.title: Karla
movie.plot: Based on real events, Canada's most notorious serial killers, Paul Bernardo and wife Karla Homolka kidnap, sexually abuse, and murder three young girls.

events.title: Timothy McVeigh and Terry Nichols bomb a federal building

movie.title: Oklahoma City
movie.plot: The bombing of the Alfred P. Murrah Federal Building in Oklahoma City in April 1995 is the worst act of domestic terrorism in American history. This documentary explores how a series of deadly encounters between American citizens and federal law enforcement—including the standoffs at Ruby Ridge and Waco—led to it.
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Primetime Emmy. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

events.title: the Supreme Court of India confirms Manu Sharma's life sentence for killing Jessica Lal

movie.title: No One Killed Jessica
movie.plot: A reporter teams up with the sister of a murdered model in order to bring her case justice.
